subject: Attention: Mary
body:
Civista Bank (CB).
7455 Old Troy Pike,
Huber Heights, Ohio 45424,
United States of America,
Contact Person
Ms.Buffy Tuttle
Deposit Operations Manager
Foreign Remittance Dept.,
19/02/2024


Attention: Mary


I Am in receipt of your email and the content well noted, ACH Is the
Automated Clearing House where the database system provides information
regarding your fund that it actually belongs to you. The fee is $1,650 and
everything is done correctly and legally.

The IMF is the medium where the ACH will be checked to verify if the fund
is illegal or not. After the receipt of the $1,650 an online Account will
be opened with your information where you can transfer your fund bit by bit
to any choice of your Bank Account.

2 method off paying the fee is Bank to Bank transfer or Through Bitcoin
Wallet (BTC)



Your urgent action and co-operation is required to enable us to carry out
our Duty efficiently.


Thank you for banking with us.

Yours Sincerely,
Ms. Buffy Tuttle,
Deposit Operations Manager,
Civista Bank(CB).


******************************************************************************************************************************************
DISCLAIMER NOTICE: Information contained in this email is confidential &
intended for the addresses only. Any dissemination, distribution, copying
or use of this communication without prior permission from the address is
strictly prohibited. If you are not the intended recipient of this
communication, please delete it permanently without copying, disclosing or
otherwise using its contents, and notify the (CB)immediately




Hello Ms. Buffy Tuttle,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my fund at Civista Bank. I
appreciate the update on the progress of the wire transfer. Can you please
provide me with more information about the ACH fee that needs to be
cleared? What is the purpose of this fee and how much is it?

I want to ensure that everything is done correctly and legally, so I would
like to understand the process better. Could you also explain why the IMF
needs to verify if the fund is illegal or not? Is there any specific reason
for their involvement in this matter?

Thank you for your assistance.
Best wishes,
Mary

subject: Re: Attention: Mary
body:
Hello Ms. Buffy Tuttle,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding my fund at Civista Bank. I appreciate the update on the progress of the wire transfer. Can you please provide me with more information about the ACH fee that needs to be cleared? What is the purpose of this fee and how much is it?

I want to ensure that everything is done correctly and legally, so I would like to understand the process better. Could you also explain why the IMF needs to verify if the fund is illegal or not? Is there any specific reason for their involvement in this matter?

Thank you for your assistance.

Best wishes,
Mary
